document.masterDocTitle: Three new species of Oxypoda from Spain, Armenia, and Ukraine with notes on the fauna of Armenia (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Aleocharinae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Three new species of Oxypoda from Spain, Armenia, and Ukraine with notes on the fauna of Armenia (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Aleocharinae)

subSubSection.paragraph:

C o m m e n t:
Oxypoda brevicornis
is widespread and common across the Palaearctic region, but was previously unknown from Armenia .
